title: Is there a way to watch a tourny code game replay?
body: We run tournys, and this could be a usefull thing when trying to figure out when a team has broken a rule. So just wondering if there is a way to check tourny code games on replay?

replies.body: Hmmmmmm AFAIK the only way to get replays is from the client itself, so you may need to be in touch with someone who was in those games to save their replay. One good idea I've seen others do is to set up some recording software in advance so that you're able to spectate and record the game how you wish.
